00001 /*
00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              2ND ORDER BUTTERWORTH BANDREJECT FILTER
00004  *              based on an algorithm from Dodge & Jerse (1997): 
00005  *              Computer Music Synthesis, Composition, and Performance 2nd edition
00006  *              Schirmer
00007  *******************************************************
00008  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object
00009  *              copyright © 2007 by Trond Lossius
00010  *
00011  */
00012 
00013 // Check against redundant including
00014 #ifndef TT_BANDREJECT_BUTTERWORTH_H
00015 #define TT_BANDREJECT_BUTTERWORTH_H
00016 
00017 // Include appropriate headers
00018 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00019 
00020 
00021 /********************************************************
00022         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00023 
00024         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00025  ********************************************************/
00026 
00027 class tt_bandreject_butterworth:public tt_audio_base{
00028 
00029         private:
00030                 tt_attribute_value              resonance;                                              // filter resonance
00031                 tt_attribute_value              frequency;                                              // center frequency
00032                 double                                  c, d, bw, a0, a1, a2, b1, b2;   // filter coefficients
00033                 double                                  xm1, xm2, ym1, ym2;                             // previous input and output samples
00034                 double                                  f, fb;
00035         
00036         
00037         public:
00038                 enum selectors{                                                                                                                 
00039                         k_frequency,
00040                         k_resonance                                                                                     // Attribute Selectors
00041                 };
00042                 
00043 
00044                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00045                 tt_bandreject_butterworth()                                                             // Constructor          
00046                 {
00047                         set_attr(k_frequency, 440.0);
00048                         set_attr(k_resonance, 100.)     
00049                         clear();
00050                 }
00051 
00052                 ~tt_bandreject_butterworth()                                                    // Destructor
00053                 {
00054                         ;
00055                 }
00056 
00057 
00058                 // ATTRIBUTES
00059                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00060                 {
00061                         switch (sel){                   
00062                                 case k_frequency:
00063                                         frequency = val;
00064                                         break;                          
00065                                 case k_resonance:
00066                                         resonance = val;
00067                                         // Avoid dividing by zero
00068                                         if (resonance<=0)
00069                                                 resonance = 1;
00070                                         break;                          
00071                         }
00072                                 
00073                         bw = center/resonance;
00074                         c = tan( PI*(bw/x->sr) );
00075                         d = 2.0 * cos( 2.0*PI*(center/sr) );
00076                         a0 = 1.0 / (1.0 + c);
00077                         a1 = -1.0 * a0 * d;
00078                         a2 = a0;
00079                         b1 = a1;
00080                         b2 = a0 * (1.0 - c);
00081                 }
00082 
00083                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00084                 {
00085                         switch (sel){
00086                                 case k_frequency:
00087                                         return frequency;
00088                                 default:
00089                                         return 0.0;
00090                         }
00091                 }
00092                 
00093                 
00094                 // DSP LOOP
00095                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *input, tt_audio_signal *output)
00096                 {
00097                         tt_sample_value temp;
00098                         temp_vs = input->vectorsize;
00099                         
00100                         while(temp_vs--){
00101                                 temp = *input->vector++;
00102                                 *output->vector++ = anti_denormal(a0*tem + a1*xm1 + a2*xm2 - b1*ym1 - b2*ym2);
00103                                 xm2 = xm1;
00104                                 xm1 = temp:
00105                                 ym2 = ym1:
00106                                 ym1 = *output;
00107                         }
00108                         input->reset(); output->reset();
00109                 }
00110 
00111 
00112                 // clear
00113                 void clear()
00114                 {               
00115                         xm1 = 0;
00116                         xm2 = 0;
00117                         ym1 = 0;
00118                         ym2 = 0;
00119                 }
00120                 
00121 };
00122 
00123 
00124 #endif  // TT_BANDREJECT_BUTTERWORTH_H
